pages.text: In order to get started with candle making, you will need some chunks of soy wax. Reference the wax entry for more information on how to obtain different waxes.

pages.title: Making the Wick
pages.text: To make any candle, you are going to need to craft a few candle wicks. These allow for candles to be lit using a Flint and Steel.

pages.title: Filling the Press
pages.text: Crafting a Basic Soy Candle is very easy. Simply combine some wax and a wick to yield a single candle. These basic Soy Candles can be combined with dye to yield a candle of that dye color.
Bee Wax can be used to create a unique transparent candle.
Ear Wax can also be used to create a decorative melted candle as well.
